function.name: getDatasource
function.help: Get a datasource structure representation (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: alias
parameter.help: The alias of the datasource to get from the config structures

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: The mapping name or CFC path to retrieve

parameter.name: dsl
parameter.help: The DSL string to use to retrieve an instance

parameter.name: initArguments
parameter.help: The constructor structure of arguments to passthrough when initializing the instance

function.name: getInstance
function.help: Get a instance object from WireBox (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: The mapping name or CFC path to retrieve

parameter.name: dsl
parameter.help: The DSL string to use to retrieve an instance

parameter.name: initArguments
parameter.help: The constructor structure of arguments to passthrough when initializing the instance

function.name: populateModel
function.help: Populate a model object from the request Collection or a passed in memento structure (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: model
parameter.help: The name of the model to get and populate or the acutal model object. If you already have an instance of a model, then use the populateBean() method

parameter.name: scope
parameter.help: Use scope injection instead of setters population. Ex: scope=variables.instance.

parameter.name: trustedSetter
parameter.help: If set to true, the setter method will be called even if it does not exist in the object

parameter.name: include
parameter.help: A list of keys to include in the population

parameter.name: exclude
parameter.help: A list of keys to exclude in the population

parameter.name: ignoreEmpty
parameter.help: Ignore empty values on populations, great for ORM population

parameter.name: nullEmptyInclude
parameter.help: A list of keys to NULL when empty

parameter.name: nullEmptyExclude
parameter.help: A list of keys to NOT NULL when empty

parameter.name: composeRelationships
parameter.help: Automatically attempt to compose relationships from memento

parameter.name: memento
parameter.help: A structure to populate the model, if not passed it defaults to the request collection

parameter.name: jsonstring
parameter.help: If you pass a json string, we will populate your model with it

parameter.name: xml
parameter.help: If you pass an xml string, we will populate your model with it

parameter.name: qry
parameter.help: If you pass a query, we will populate your model with it

function.name: getRenderer
function.help: Retrieve the system web renderer (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

function.name: getRequestContext
function.help: Retrieve the request context object (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

function.name: getRequestCollection
function.help: Get the RC or PRC collection reference (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: private
parameter.help: The boolean bit that says give me the RC by default or true for the private collection (PRC)

parameter.name: view
parameter.help: The the view to render, if not passed, then we look in the request context for the current set view.

parameter.name: args
parameter.help: A struct of arguments to pass into the view for rendering, will be available as 'args' in the view.

parameter.name: module
parameter.help: The module to render the view from explicitly

parameter.name: cache
parameter.help: Cached the view output or not, defaults to false

parameter.name: cacheTimeout
parameter.help: The time in minutes to cache the view

parameter.name: cacheLastAccessTimeout
parameter.help: The time in minutes the view will be removed from cache if idle or requested

parameter.name: cacheSuffix
parameter.help: The suffix to add into the cache entry for this view rendering

parameter.name: cacheProvider
parameter.help: The provider to cache this view in, defaults to 'template'

parameter.name: collection
parameter.help: A collection to use by this Renderer to render the view as many times as the items in the collection (Array or Query)

parameter.name: collectionAs
parameter.help: The name of the collection variable in the partial rendering. If not passed, we will use the name of the view by convention

parameter.name: collectionStartRow
parameter.help: The start row to limit the collection rendering with

parameter.name: collectionMaxRows
parameter.help: The max rows to iterate over the collection rendering with

parameter.name: collectionDelim
parameter.help: A string to delimit the collection renderings by

parameter.name: prePostExempt
parameter.help: If true, pre/post view interceptors will not be fired. By default they do fire

function.name: renderExternalView
function.help: Renders an external view anywhere that cfinclude works. (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: view
parameter.help: The the view to render

parameter.name: args
parameter.help: A struct of arguments to pass into the view for rendering, will be available as 'args' in the view.

parameter.name: cache
parameter.help: Cached the view output or not, defaults to false

parameter.name: cacheTimeout
parameter.help: The time in minutes to cache the view

parameter.name: cacheLastAccessTimeout
parameter.help: The time in minutes the view will be removed from cache if idle or requested

parameter.name: cacheSuffix
parameter.help: The suffix to add into the cache entry for this view rendering

parameter.name: cacheProvider
parameter.help: The provider to cache this view in, defaults to 'template'

function.name: renderLayout
function.help: Render a layout or a layout + view combo (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: layout
parameter.help: The layout to render out

parameter.name: module
parameter.help: The module to explicitly render this layout from

parameter.name: view
parameter.help: The view to render within this layout

parameter.name: args
parameter.help: An optional set of arguments that will be available to this layouts/view rendering ONLY

parameter.name: viewModule
parameter.help: The module to explicitly render the view from

parameter.name: prePostExempt
parameter.help: If true, pre/post layout interceptors will not be fired. By default they do fire

parameter.name: interceptorName
parameter.help: The name of the interceptor to retrieve

function.name: announceInterception
function.help: Announce an interception to the system. If you use the asynchronous facilities, you will get a thread structure report as a result. (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: state
parameter.help: The event to announce

parameter.name: interceptData
parameter.help: A data structure used to pass intercepted information.

parameter.name: async
parameter.help: If true, the entire interception chain will be ran in a separate thread.

parameter.name: asyncAll
parameter.help: If true, each interceptor in the interception chain will be ran in a separate thread and then joined together at the end.

parameter.name: asyncAllJoin
parameter.help: If true, each interceptor in the interception chain will be ran in a separate thread and joined together at the end by default. If you set this flag to false then there will be no joining and waiting for the threads to finalize.

parameter.name: asyncPriority
parameter.help: The thread priority to be used. Either LOW, NORMAL or HIGH. The default value is NORMAL

parameter.name: asyncJoinTimeout
parameter.help: The timeout in milliseconds for the join thread to wait for interceptor threads to finish. By default there is no timeout.

function.name: getCache
function.help: Get a named CacheBox Cache (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: The name of the cache to retrieve, if not passed, it used the 'default' cache.

function.name: getSettingStructure
function.help: DEPRECATED: Get all the settings structure (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: fwSetting
parameter.help: Retrieve from the config or fw settings, defaults to config

parameter.name: deepCopy
parameter.help: Do a deep or shallow copy, shallow is default

function.name: getSetting
function.help: Get a setting from the system (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: The key of the setting

parameter.name: fwSetting
parameter.help: Retrieve from the config or fw settings, defaults to config

parameter.name: defaultValue
parameter.help: If not found in config, default return value

function.name: settingExists
function.help: Verify a setting from the system (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: The key of the setting

parameter.name: fwSetting
parameter.help: Retrieve from the config or fw settings, defaults to config

function.name: setSetting
function.help: Set a new setting in the system (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: The key of the setting

parameter.name: value
parameter.help: The value of the setting

function.name: getModuleSettings
function.help: Get a module's settings structure or a specific setting if the setting key is passed (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: module
parameter.help: The module to retrieve the configuration settings from

parameter.name: setting
parameter.help: The setting to retrieve if passed

parameter.name: defaultValue
parameter.help: The default value to return if setting does not exist

function.name: getModuleConfig
function.help: Get a module's configuration structure (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: module
parameter.help: The module to retrieve the configuration structure from

function.name: setNextEvent
function.help: Relocate the user to another location (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: event
parameter.help: The name of the event to run, if not passed, then it will use the default event found in your configuration file

parameter.name: URL
parameter.help: The full URL you would like to relocate to instead of an event: ex: URL='http://www.google.com'

parameter.name: URI
parameter.help: The relative URI you would like to relocate to instead of an event: ex: URI='/mypath/awesome/here'

parameter.name: queryString
parameter.help: The query string to append, if needed. If in SES mode it will be translated to convention name value pairs

parameter.name: persist
parameter.help: What request collection keys to persist in flash ram

parameter.name: persistStruct
parameter.help: A structure key-value pairs to persist in flash ram

parameter.name: addToken
parameter.help: Wether to add the tokens or not. Default is false

parameter.name: ssl
parameter.help: Whether to relocate in SSL or not

parameter.name: baseURL
parameter.help: Use this baseURL instead of the index.cfm that is used by default. You can use this for ssl or any full base url you would like to use. Ex: https://mysite.com/index.cfm

parameter.name: postProcessExempt
parameter.help: Do not fire the postProcess interceptors

parameter.name: statusCode
parameter.help: The status code to use in the relocation

function.name: runEvent
function.help: Executes events with full life-cycle methods and returns the event results if any were returned. (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: event
parameter.help: The event string to execute, if nothing is passed we will execute the application's default event.

parameter.name: prePostExempt
parameter.help: If true, pre/post handlers will not be fired. Defaults to false

parameter.name: private
parameter.help: Execute a private event if set, else defaults to public events

parameter.name: defaultEvent
parameter.help: The flag that let's this service now if it is the default event running or not. USED BY THE FRAMEWORK ONLY

parameter.name: eventArguments
parameter.help: A collection of arguments to passthrough to the calling event handler method

parameter.name: cache
parameter.help: Cached the output of the runnable execution, defaults to false. A unique key will be created according to event string + arguments.

parameter.name: cacheTimeout
parameter.help: The time in minutes to cache the results

parameter.name: cacheLastAccessTimeout
parameter.help: The time in minutes the results will be removed from cache if idle or requested

parameter.name: cacheSuffix
parameter.help: The suffix to add into the cache entry for this event rendering

parameter.name: cacheProvider
parameter.help: The provider to cache this event rendering in, defaults to 'template'

function.name: persistVariables
function.help: Persist variables into the Flash RAM (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: persist
parameter.help: A list of request collection keys to persist

parameter.name: persistStruct
parameter.help: A struct of key-value pairs to persist

function.name: locateFilePath
function.help: Resolve a file to be either relative or absolute in your application (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: pathToCheck
parameter.help: The file path to check

function.name: locateDirectoryPath
function.help: Resolve a directory to be either relative or absolute in your application (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: pathToCheck
parameter.help: The file path to check

function.name: addAsset
function.help: Add a js/css asset(s) to the html head section. You can also pass in a list of assets. This method keeps track of the loaded assets so they are only loaded once (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: asset
parameter.help: The asset(s) to load, only js or css files. This can also be a comma delimmited list.

function.name: includeUDF
function.help: Injects a UDF Library (*.cfc or *.cfm) into the target object. It does not however, put the mixins on any of the cfc scopes. Therefore they can only be called internally (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: udflibrary
parameter.help: The UDF library to inject

function.name: loadApplicationHelpers
function.help: Load the global application helper libraries defined in the applicationHelper Setting of your application. This is called by the framework ONLY! Use at your own risk (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

function.name: getPlugin
function.help: REMOVE THE FOLLOWING: JUST LEFT UNTIL COMPLETELY REMOVED *** (Context: FrameworkSupertype)

parameter.name: controller
parameter.help: The ColdBox controller

parameter.name: properties
parameter.help: The properties to init the Interceptor with

function.name: configure
function.help: Configuration method for the interceptor (Context: Interceptor)

parameter.name: property
parameter.help: The property to retrieve

parameter.name: defaultValue
parameter.help: The default value to return if property does not exist

parameter.name: property
parameter.help: The property to store

parameter.name: value
parameter.help: The value to store

parameter.name: property
parameter.help: The property to check

parameter.name: state
parameter.help: The named state to unregister this interceptor from

function.name: appendToBuffer
function.help: Append to the interceptor buffer (Context: Interceptor)

parameter.name: str
parameter.help: The string to append to the buffer

function.name: getBufferString
function.help: Get the string representation of the buffer (Context: Interceptor)

function.name: getBufferObject
function.help: Get the request buffer object from scope. (Context: Interceptor)

function.name: init
function.help: Constructor * @controller.hint The ColdBox controller * * @return EventHandler (Context: EventHandler)

function.name: _actionExists
function.help: Action exists * @action.hint The action to verify that it exists (Context: EventHandler)

function.name: _privateInvoker
function.help: _privateInvoker for private events * @method.hint The method to execute * @argCollection.hint The arguments to execute the method with. (Context: EventHandler)

scopevar.name: cachebox
scopevar.help: The ColdBox CacheBox Factory

scopevar.name: init([config],[coldbox],[factoryID])
scopevar.help: Constructor

scopevar.name: registerListeners()
scopevar.help: Register all the configured listeners in the configuration file

scopevar.name: configure(config)
scopevar.help: Configure the cache factory for operation, called by the init(). You can also re-configure CacheBox programmatically.

scopevar.name: getCache(name)
scopevar.help: Get a reference to a registered cache in this factory. If the cache does not exist it will return an exception. Type: coldbox.system.cache.ICacheProvider

scopevar.name: addCache(cache)
scopevar.help: Register a new instantiated cache with this cache factory

scopevar.name: addDefaultCache(name)
scopevar.help: Add a default named cache to our registry, create it, config it, register it and return it of type: coldbox.system.cache.ICacheProvider

scopevar.name: shutdown()
scopevar.help: Recursively sends shutdown commands to al registered caches and cleans up in preparation for shutdown

scopevar.name: shutdownCache(name)
scopevar.help: Send a shutdown command to a specific cache provider to bring down gracefully. It also removes it from the cache factory

scopevar.name: removeFromScope()
scopevar.help: Remove the cache factory from scope registration if enabled, else does nothing

scopevar.name: removeCache(name)
scopevar.help: Try to remove a named cache from this factory, returns Boolean if successfull or not

scopevar.name: removeAll()
scopevar.help: Remove all the registered caches in this factory, this triggers individual cache shutdowns

scopevar.name: reapAll()
scopevar.help: A nice way to call reap on all registered caches

scopevar.name: cacheExists(name)
scopevar.help: Check if the passed in named cache is already registered in this factory or not

scopevar.name: replaceCache(cache,decoratedCache)
scopevar.help: Replace a registered named cache with a new decorated cache of the same name.

scopevar.name: clearAll()
scopevar.help: Clears all the elements in all the registered caches without de-registrations

scopevar.name: expireAll()
scopevar.help: Expires all the elements in all the registered caches without de-registrations

scopevar.name: getCacheNames()
scopevar.help: Get the array of caches registered with this factory

scopevar.name: getCaches()
scopevar.help: Get a reference to all the registered caches in the cache factory as a structure

scopevar.name: getColdbox()
scopevar.help: Get the instance of ColdBox linked in this cache factory. Empty if using standalone version

scopevar.name: isColdBoxLinked()
scopevar.help: Checks if Coldbox application controller is linked

scopevar.name: getLogBox()
scopevar.help: Get the instance of LogBox configured for this cache factory

scopevar.name: getVersion()
scopevar.help: Get the CacheBox version string.

scopevar.name: getConfig()
scopevar.help: Get this LogBox's configuration object.

scopevar.name: getFactoryID()
scopevar.help: Get the unique ID of this cache factory

scopevar.name: getDefaultCache()
scopevar.help: Get the default cache provider of type coldbox.system.cache.ICacheProvider

scopevar.name: getEventManager()
scopevar.help: Get the cache factory's event manager

scopevar.name: getScopeRegistration()
scopevar.help: Get the scope registration information

scopevar.name: createCache(name,provider,[properties])
scopevar.help: Create a new cache according the the arguments, register it and return it of type: coldbox.system.cache.ICacheProvider

scopevar.name: doScopeRegistration()
scopevar.help: Register this cachefactory on a user specified scope

scopevar.name: registerCache(cache)
scopevar.help: Register a cache instance internaly

scopevar.name: configureLogBox(configPath)
scopevar.help: Configure a standalone version of logBox for logging

scopevar.name: configureEventManager()
scopevar.help: Configure a standalone version of a ColdBox Event Manager

scopevar.name: getUtil()
scopevar.help: Create and return a util object

scopevar.name: logbox
scopevar.help: This is LogBox, an enterprise logger. Please remember to persist this factory once it has been created.

scopevar.name: init(config,[coldbox])
scopevar.help: Constructor

scopevar.name: configure(config)
scopevar.help: Configure logbox for operation. You can also re-configure LogBox programmatically. Basically we register all appenders here and all categories

scopevar.name: getVersion()
scopevar.help: Get the LogBox version string.

scopevar.name: getConfig()
scopevar.help: Get this LogBox's configuration object.

scopevar.name: getRootLogger()
scopevar.help: Get the root logger

scopevar.name: getLogger(category)
scopevar.help: Get a logger object configured with a category name and appenders. If not configured, then it reverts to the root logger defined for this instance of LogBox

scopevar.name: getCurrentLoggers()
scopevar.help: Get the list of currently instantiated loggers.

scopevar.name: getCurrentAppenders()
scopevar.help: Get the list of currently registered appenders.

scopevar.name: registerAppender(name,class,[properties],[layout],[levelMin],[levelMax])
scopevar.help: Register a new appender object in the appender registry.

scopevar.name: locateCategoryParentLogger(category)
scopevar.help: Get a parent logger according to category convention inheritance. If not found, it returns the root logger.

scopevar.name: getAppendersMap(appenders)
scopevar.help: Get a map of appenders by list. Usually called to get a category of appenders.

scopevar.name: getUtil()
scopevar.help: Create and return a util object

scopevar.name: binder
scopevar.help: This is a WireBox configuration binder object. You can use it to configure a WireBox injector instance using our WireBox Mapping DSL

scopevar.name: init(injector,[config],[properties])
scopevar.help: Constructor: You can pass a data CFC instance, data CFC path or nothing at all for purely programmatic configuration

scopevar.name: getInjector()
scopevar.help: Get the bounded injector for this binder

scopevar.name: getColdBox()
scopevar.help: Get the bounded ColdBox context for this binder, if any

scopevar.name: getAppMapping()
scopevar.help: Get the ColdBox app mapping variable if context linked

scopevar.name: configure()
scopevar.help: The main configuration method that must be overriden by a specific WireBox Binder configuration object

scopevar.name: reset()
scopevar.help: Reset the configuration back to the original binder defaults

scopevar.name: getProperties()
scopevar.help: Get the binded properties structure

scopevar.name: setProperties(properties)
scopevar.help: Set the binded properties structure

scopevar.name: getProperty(name,[default])
scopevar.help: Get a binded property. If not found it will try to return the default value passed, else it returns an exception

scopevar.name: setProperty(name,value)
scopevar.help: Create a new binding property

scopevar.name: propertyExists(name)
scopevar.help: Checks if a property exists

scopevar.name: getParentInjector()
scopevar.help: Get the parent injector reference this binder is linked to

scopevar.name: parentInjector(injector)
scopevar.help: Link a parent injector to this configuration binder

scopevar.name: getMappings()
scopevar.help: Get all the registered object mappings structure

scopevar.name: getMapping(name)
scopevar.help: Get a specific object mapping: coldbox.system.ioc.config.Mapping

scopevar.name: setMapping(name,mapping)
scopevar.help: Set a mapping object into the mappings map

scopevar.name: unMap(name)
scopevar.help: Destroys a mapping by name

scopevar.name: mappingExists(name)
scopevar.help: Check if an object mapping exists

scopevar.name: mapPath(path,[namespace],[prepend],[force])
scopevar.help: Directly map to a path by using the last part of the path as the alias. This is equivalent to map('MyService').to('model.MyService'). Only use if the name of the alias is the same as the last part of the path.

scopevar.name: mapDirectory(packagePath,include,exclude,[influence],[filter],[namespace],[prepend])
scopevar.help: Maps an entire instantiation path directory, please note that the unique name of each file will be used and also processed for alias inspection

scopevar.name: map(alias,[force])
scopevar.help: Create a mapping to an object

scopevar.name: to(path)
scopevar.help: Map to a destination CFC class path.

scopevar.name: parent(alias)
scopevar.help: this method lets you use an abstract or parent mapping as a template for other like objects

scopevar.name: toFactoryMethod(factory,method)
scopevar.help: Map to a factory and its executing method.

scopevar.name: methodArg([name],[ref],[dsl],[value],[javaCast])
scopevar.help: Map a method argument to a factory method

scopevar.name: toJava(path)
scopevar.help: Map to a java destination class path.

scopevar.name: toWebservice(path)
scopevar.help: Map to a webservice destination class path.

scopevar.name: toRSS(path)
scopevar.help: Map to a rss destination class path.

scopevar.name: toDSL(dsl)
scopevar.help: Map to a dsl that will be used to create the mapped object

scopevar.name: toProvider(provider)
scopevar.help: Map to a provider object that must implement coldbox.system.ioc.IProvider or a closure or UDF

scopevar.name: toValue(value)
scopevar.help: Map to a constant value

scopevar.name: constructor(constructor)
scopevar.help: You can choose what method will be treated as the constructor. By default the value is 'init', so don't call this method if that is the case.

scopevar.name: initWith()
scopevar.help: Positional or named value arguments to use when initializing the mapping. (CFC-only)

scopevar.name: noInit()
scopevar.help: If you call this method on an object mapping, the object's constructor will not be called. By default all constructors are called.

scopevar.name: virtualInheritance(mapping)
scopevar.help: Tells WireBox to do a virtual inheritance mixin of the target and this passed mapping

scopevar.name: asEagerInit()
scopevar.help: If this method is called, the mapped object will be created once the injector starts up. Basically, not lazy loaded

scopevar.name: noAutowire()
scopevar.help: If you call this method on an object mapping, the object will NOT be inspected for injection/wiring metadata, it will use ONLY whatever you define in the mapping.

scopevar.name: with(alias)
scopevar.help: Used to set the current working mapping name in place for the maping DSL. An exception is thrown if the mapping does not exist yet.

scopevar.name: initArg([name],[ref],[dsl],[value],[javaCast],[required])
scopevar.help: Map a constructor argument to a mapping

scopevar.name: setter(name,[ref],[dsl],[value],[javaCast],[argName])
scopevar.help: Map a setter function to a mapping

scopevar.name: property(name,[ref],[dsl],[value],[javaCast],[scope],[required])
scopevar.help: Map a cfproperty to a mapping

scopevar.name: onDIComplete(methods)
scopevar.help: The methods to execute once DI completes on the mapping

scopevar.name: providerMethod(method,mapping)
scopevar.help: Add a new provider method mapping

scopevar.name: into(scope)
scopevar.help: Map an object into a specific persistence scope

scopevar.name: asSingleton()
scopevar.help: Map as a singleton, shortcut to using 'in( this.SCOPES.SINGLETON )'

scopevar.name: threadSafe()
scopevar.help: Tells persistence scopes to build, wire, and do onDIComplete() on objects in an isolated lock. This will disallow circular references unless object providers are used. By default all object's constructors are the only thread safe areas

scopevar.name: notThreadSafe()
scopevar.help: This is the default wiring of objects that allow circular dependencies. By default all object's constructors are the only thread safe areas

scopevar.name: withInfluence([influenceClosure])
scopevar.help: This is a closure that will be able to influence the creation of the instance

scopevar.name: extraAttributes(data)
scopevar.help: Adds a structure of metadata to be stored with the mapping for later retrieval by the developer in events, manually or builders.

scopevar.name: mixins(mixins)
scopevar.help: Adds one, a list or an array of UDF templates to mixin to a CFC

scopevar.name: getStopRecursions()
scopevar.help: Get all the stop recursion classes array

scopevar.name: stopRecursions(classes)
scopevar.help: Configure the stop recursion classes

scopevar.name: scopeRegistration([enabled],[scope],[key])
scopevar.help: Use to define injector scope registration

scopevar.name: getScopeRegistration()
scopevar.help: Get the scope registration details structure

scopevar.name: getScanLocations()
scopevar.help: Get the linked map of package scan locations for CFCs

scopevar.name: scanLocations(locations)
scopevar.help: Register one or more package scan locations for CFC lookups

scopevar.name: removeScanLocations(locations)
scopevar.help: Try to remove all the scan locations passed in

scopevar.name: cacheBox([configFile],[cacheFactory],[enabled],[classNamespace])
scopevar.help: Integrate with CacheBox

scopevar.name: getCacheBoxConfig()
scopevar.help: Get the CacheBox Configuration Integration structure

scopevar.name: inCacheBox([key],[timeout],[lastAccessTimeout],[provider])
scopevar.help: Map an object into CacheBox

scopevar.name: mapDSL(namespace,path)
scopevar.help: Register a new custom dsl namespace

scopevar.name: getCustomDSL()
scopevar.help: Get the custom dsl namespace registration structure

scopevar.name: mapScope(annotation,path)
scopevar.help: Register a new WireBox custom scope

scopevar.name: getCustomScopes()
scopevar.help: Get the registered custom scopes

scopevar.name: logBoxConfig(config)
scopevar.help: Set the logBox Configuration to use

scopevar.name: getLogBoxConfig()
scopevar.help: Get the logBox Configuration file to use

scopevar.name: loadDataDSL([rawDSL])
scopevar.help: Load a data configuration CFC data DSL

scopevar.name: getDefaults()
scopevar.help: Get the default WireBox settings structure

scopevar.name: getMemento()
scopevar.help: Get the instance data structure

scopevar.name: getCurrentMapping()
scopevar.help: Get the current set mapping (UTILITY method)

scopevar.name: processMappings()
scopevar.help: Process all registered mappings, called by injector when ready to start serving requests

scopevar.name: listener(class,[properties],[name])
scopevar.help: Add a new listener configuration.

scopevar.name: getListeners()
scopevar.help: Get the configured listeners array

scopevar.name: mapAspect(aspect,autoBinding)
scopevar.help: Map a new aspect

scopevar.name: match()
scopevar.help: Create a new matcher class for usage in class or method matching

scopevar.name: bindAspect(classes,methods,aspects)
scopevar.help: Bind a aspects to classes and methods

scopevar.name: getAspectBindings()
scopevar.help: Get the collection of aspect bindings for this binder

scopevar.name: log
scopevar.help: This is a logging object that allows for all kinds of logging to occur within its appenders

scopevar.name: init(category,[levelMin],[levelMax],[appenders])
scopevar.help: Create a new logger object.

scopevar.name: getRootLogger()
scopevar.help: Get the root logger

scopevar.name: setRootLogger(RootLogger)
scopevar.help: Set the root logger for this named logger.

scopevar.name: hasAppenders()
scopevar.help: Checks to see if we have registered any appenders yet

scopevar.name: getAppenders()
scopevar.help: Get all the registered appenders for this logger.

scopevar.name: getAppender(name)
scopevar.help: Get a named appender from this logger class. If the appender does not exists, it will throw an exception.

scopevar.name: appenderExists(name)
scopevar.help: Checks to see if a specified appender exists by name.

scopevar.name: addAppender(newAppender)
scopevar.help: Add a new appender to the list of appenders for this logger. If the appender already exists, then it will not be added.

scopevar.name: removeAppender(name)
scopevar.help: Unregister an appender from this Logger. True if successful or false otherwise.

scopevar.name: removeAllAppenders()
scopevar.help: Removes all appenders registered

scopevar.name: getlevelMin()
scopevar.help: Get the level min setting

scopevar.name: setLevelMin(levelMin)
scopevar.help: Set the appender's default levelMin

scopevar.name: getlevelMax()
scopevar.help: Get the level Max setting

scopevar.name: setLevelMax(levelMax)
scopevar.help: Set the appender's default levelMax

scopevar.name: getCategory()
scopevar.help: Get the configured category for this logger

scopevar.name: setCategory(category)
scopevar.help: Set the category for this logger

scopevar.name: debug(message,[extraInfo])
scopevar.help: I log a debug message.

scopevar.name: info(message,[extraInfo])
scopevar.help: I log an information message.

scopevar.name: warn(message,[extraInfo])
scopevar.help: I log a warning message.

scopevar.name: error(message,[extraInfo])
scopevar.help: I log an error message.

scopevar.name: fatal(message,[extraInfo])
scopevar.help: I log a fatal message.

scopevar.name: logMessage(message,severity,[extraInfo])
scopevar.help: Write an entry into the loggers registered with this LogBox instance.

scopevar.name: canLog(level)
scopevar.help: Checks wether a log can be made on this Logger using a passed in level

scopevar.name: canFatal()
scopevar.help: Can log fatal messages

scopevar.name: canError()
scopevar.help: Can log error messages

scopevar.name: canWarn()
scopevar.help: Can log warn messages

scopevar.name: canInfo()
scopevar.help: Can log info messages

scopevar.name: canDebug()
scopevar.help: Can log debug messages

scopevar.name: wirebox
scopevar.help: A WireBox Injector: Builds the graphs of objects that make up your application.

scopevar.name: init([binder],[properties],[coldbox])
scopevar.help: Constructor. If called without a configuration binder, then WireBox will instantiate the default configuration binder found in: coldbox.system.ioc.config.DefaultBinder

scopevar.name: configure(binder,properties)
scopevar.help: Configure this injector for operation, called by the init(). You can also re-configure this injector programmatically, but it is not recommended.

scopevar.name: shutdown()
scopevar.help: Shutdown the injector gracefully by calling the shutdown events internally.

scopevar.name: getInstance([name],[dsl],[initArguments],[targetObject])
scopevar.help: Locates, Creates, Injects and Configures an object model instance

scopevar.name: buildInstance(mapping,[initArguments])
scopevar.help: Build an instance, this is called from registered scopes only as they provide locking and transactions

scopevar.name: registerNewInstance(name,instancePath)
scopevar.help: Register a new requested mapping object instance thread safely and returns the mapping configured for this instance

scopevar.name: registerDSL(namespace,path)
scopevar.help: A direct way of registering custom DSL namespaces

scopevar.name: containsInstance(name)
scopevar.help: Checks if this injector can locate a model instance or not

scopevar.name: locateInstance(name)
scopevar.help: Tries to locate a specific instance by scanning all scan locations and returning the instantiation path. If model not found then the returned instantiation path will be empty

scopevar.name: autowire(target,[mapping],[targetID],[annotationCheck])
scopevar.help: I wire up target objects with dependencies either by mappings or a-la-carte autowires

scopevar.name: processMixins(targetObject,mapping)
scopevar.help: Process mixins on the selected target

scopevar.name: processProviderMethods(targetObject,mapping)
scopevar.help: Process provider methods on the selected target

scopevar.name: processAfterCompleteDI(targetObject,DICompleteMethods)
scopevar.help: Process after DI completion routines

scopevar.name: processInjection(targetObject,DIData,targetID)
scopevar.help: Process property and setter injection

scopevar.name: injectTarget(target,propertyName,propertyObject,scope,argName)
scopevar.help: Inject a model object with dependencies via setters or property injections

scopevar.name: setParent(injector)
scopevar.help: Link a parent Injector with this injector

scopevar.name: getParent()
scopevar.help: Get a reference to the parent injector instance, else an empty simple string meaning nothing is set

scopevar.name: getObjectPopulator()
scopevar.help: Get an object populator useful for populating objects from JSON,XML, etc.

scopevar.name: getColdbox()
scopevar.help: Get the instance of ColdBox linked in this Injector. Empty if using standalone version

scopevar.name: isColdBoxLinked()
scopevar.help: Checks if Coldbox application context is linked

scopevar.name: getCacheBox()
scopevar.help: Get the instance of CacheBox linked in this Injector. Empty if using standalone version

scopevar.name: isCacheBoxLinked()
scopevar.help: Checks if CacheBox is linked

scopevar.name: getLogBox()
scopevar.help: Get the instance of LogBox configured for this Injector

scopevar.name: getVersion()
scopevar.help: Get the Injector's version string.

scopevar.name: getBinder()
scopevar.help: Get the Injector's configuration binder object

scopevar.name: getBuilder()
scopevar.help: Get the Injector's builder object

scopevar.name: getInjectorID()
scopevar.help: Get the unique ID of this injector

scopevar.name: getEventManager()
scopevar.help: Get the injector's event manager

scopevar.name: getScopeRegistration()
scopevar.help: Get the structure of scope registration information

scopevar.name: getScopeStorage()
scopevar.help: Get the scope storage utility

scopevar.name: removeFromScope()
scopevar.help: Remove the Injector from scope registration if enabled, else does nothing

scopevar.name: getScopes()
scopevar.help: Get all the registered scopes structure in this injector

scopevar.name: getScope(scope)
scopevar.help: Get a registered scope in this injector by name

scopevar.name: clearSingletons()
scopevar.help: Clear the singleton cache

scopevar.name: locateScopedSelf()
scopevar.help: Return a self reference using the scoped registration, mostly used by providers or scope widening objects

scopevar.name: registerScopes()
scopevar.help: Register all internal and configured WireBox Scopes

scopevar.name: registerListeners()
scopevar.help: Register all the configured listeners in the configuration file

scopevar.name: doScopeRegistration()
scopevar.help: Register this injector on a user specified scope

scopevar.name: configureCacheBox(config)
scopevar.help: Configure a standalone version of cacheBox for persistence

scopevar.name: configureLogBox(configPath)
scopevar.help: Configure a standalone version of logBox for logging

scopevar.name: configureEventManager()
scopevar.help: Configure a standalone version of a WireBox Event Manager

scopevar.name: getUtil()
scopevar.help: Return the core util object

scopevar.name: buildBinder(binder,properties)
scopevar.help: Load a configuration binder object according to passed in type

scopevar.name: flash
scopevar.help: Copyright Since 2005 ColdBox Framework by Luis Majano and Ortus Solutions, Corp www.ortussolutions.com An abstract flash scope that can be used to build ColdBox Flash scopes. In order to build scopes you must implement the following methods: - clearFlash() A method that will destroy the flash storage - saveFlash() A method that will be called before relocating so the storage can be saved - flashExists() A method that tells ColdBox if the storage exists and if it has content to inflate - getFlash() A method that returns the flash storage All these methds can use any of the concrete methods below. The most important one is the getScope() method which will most likely be called by the saveFlash() method in order to persist the flashed map.

scopevar.name: init(controller,defaults)
scopevar.help: Constructor

scopevar.name: saveFlash()
scopevar.help: Save the flash storage in preparing to go to the next request

scopevar.name: flashExists()
scopevar.help: Checks if the flash storage exists and IT HAS DATA to inflate.

scopevar.name: getFlash()
scopevar.help: Get the flash storage structure to inflate it.

scopevar.name: removeFlash()
scopevar.help: Remove the entire flash storage

scopevar.name: clearFlash()
scopevar.help: Clear the flash storage

scopevar.name: getScope()
scopevar.help: Get the flash temp request storage used throughout a request until flashed at the end of a request.

scopevar.name: getKeys()
scopevar.help: Get a list of all the objects in the temp flash scope

scopevar.name: clear()
scopevar.help: Clear the temp flash scope and remove all data

scopevar.name: keep([keys])
scopevar.help: Keep all or a single flash temp variable alive for another relocation

scopevar.name: discard([keys])
scopevar.help: Keep all or a single flash temp variable alive for another relocation

scopevar.name: put(name,value,[saveNow],[keep],[inflateToRC],[inflateToPRC],[autoPurge])
scopevar.help: Keep all or a single flash temp variable alive for another relocation

scopevar.name: putAll(map,[saveNow],[keep],[inflateToRC],[inflateToPRC],[autoPurge])
scopevar.help: Put a map of name-value pairs into the flash scope

scopevar.name: remove(name,[saveNow])
scopevar.help: Remove an object from flash scope

scopevar.name: exists(name)
scopevar.help: Check if an object exists in flash scope

scopevar.name: size()
scopevar.help: Get the size of the items in flash scope

scopevar.name: isEmpty()
scopevar.help: Check if the flash scope is empty or not

scopevar.name: get(name,[defaultValue])
scopevar.help: Get an object from flash scope

scopevar.name: persistRC([include],[exclude],[saveNow])
scopevar.help: Persist keys from the coldbox request collection in flash scope. If using exclude, then it will try to persist the entire rc but excluding. Including will only include the keys passed

scopevar.name: getProperty(property)
scopevar.help: Get a named property

scopevar.name: setProperty(property,value)
scopevar.help: Set a named property

scopevar.name: propertyExists(property)
scopevar.help: Check a named property

scopevar.name: statusMarks([keys],[keep])
scopevar.help: Change the status marks of the temp scope entries

scopevar.name: getUtil()
scopevar.help: Get utility object

scopevar.name: event
scopevar.help: Copyright Since 2005 ColdBox Framework by Luis Majano and Ortus Solutions, Corp www.ortussolutions.com Models a ColdBox request, stores the incoming request collection and private request collection. It is also used to determine metadata about a request and helps you build RESTFul responses.

scopevar.name: init(properties,controller)
scopevar.help: Constructor

scopevar.name: getMemento()
scopevar.help: Get a representation of this instance

scopevar.name: setMemento(memento)
scopevar.help: Override the instance

scopevar.name: getCollection([deepCopy],[private])
scopevar.help: I Get a reference or deep copy of the public or private request Collection

scopevar.name: getPrivateCollection([deepCopy])
scopevar.help: I get a private collection

scopevar.name: clearCollection([private])
scopevar.help: Clears the entire collection

scopevar.name: clearPrivateCollection()
scopevar.help: Clears the private collection

scopevar.name: collectionAppend(collection,[overwrite],[private])
scopevar.help: Append a structure to the collection, with overwrite or not. Overwrite = false by default

scopevar.name: privateCollectionAppend(collection,[overwrite])
scopevar.help: Append a structure to the collection, with overwrite or not. Overwrite = false by default

scopevar.name: getSize([private])
scopevar.help: Get the collection Size

scopevar.name: getPrivateSize()
scopevar.help: Get the private collection Size

scopevar.name: getValue(name,[defaultValue],[private])
scopevar.help: Get a value from the public or private request collection.

scopevar.name: getPrivateValue(name,[defaultValue])
scopevar.help: Get a value from the private request collection.

scopevar.name: getTrimValue(name,[defaultValue],[private])
scopevar.help: Get a value from the request collection and if simple value, I will trim it.

scopevar.name: getPrivateTrimValue(name,[defaultValue])
scopevar.help: Get a trim value from the private request collection.

scopevar.name: setValue(name,value,[private])
scopevar.help: Set a value in the request collection

scopevar.name: setPrivateValue(name,value)
scopevar.help: Set a value in the private request collection

scopevar.name: removeValue(name,[private])
scopevar.help: remove a value in the request collection

scopevar.name: removePrivateValue(name,[private])
scopevar.help: remove a value in the private request collection

scopevar.name: valueExists(name,[private])
scopevar.help: Check if a value exists in the request collection

scopevar.name: privateValueExists(name)
scopevar.help: Check if a value exists in the private request collection

scopevar.name: paramValue(name,value,[private])
scopevar.help: Just like cfparam, but for the request collection

scopevar.name: paramPrivateValue(name,value)
scopevar.help: Just like cfparam, but for the private request collection

scopevar.name: getCurrentView()
scopevar.help: Gets the current set view the framework will try to render for this request

scopevar.name: getCurrentViewArgs()
scopevar.help: Gets the current set view the framework will try to render for this request

scopevar.name: getCurrentViewModule()
scopevar.help: Gets the current set views's module for rendering

scopevar.name: getCurrentLayout()
scopevar.help: Gets the current set layout for rendering

scopevar.name: getCurrentLayoutModule()
scopevar.help: Gets the current set layout's module for rendering

scopevar.name: getCurrentRoute()
scopevar.help: Get the current request's SES route that matched

scopevar.name: getCurrentRoutedURL()
scopevar.help: Get the current routed URL that matched the SES route

scopevar.name: getCurrentRoutedNamespace()
scopevar.help: Get the current routed namespace that matched the SES route, if any

scopevar.name: getCurrentEvent()
scopevar.help: Gets the current incoming event

scopevar.name: getCurrentHandler()
scopevar.help: Gets the current handler requested in the current event

scopevar.name: getCurrentAction()
scopevar.help: Gets the current action requested in the current event

scopevar.name: getCurrentModule()
scopevar.help: Gets the current module name, else returns empty string

scopevar.name: getModuleRoot([module])
scopevar.help: Convenience method to get the current request's module root path. If no module, then returns empty path. You can also get this from the modules settings

scopevar.name: isSSL()
scopevar.help: Are we in SSL or not? This method looks at cgi.server_port_secure for indication

scopevar.name: setView([view],[args],[layout],[module],[noLayout],[cache],[cacheTimeout],[cacheLastAccessTimeout],[cacheSuffix],[cacheProvider])
scopevar.help: Set the view to render in this request. Private Request Collection Name: currentView, currentLayout

scopevar.name: noLayout()
scopevar.help: Mark this request to not use a layout for rendering

scopevar.name: setLayout(name,[module])
scopevar.help: Set the layout to override and render. Layouts are pre-defined in the config file. However I can override these settings if needed. Do not append a the cfm extension. Private Request Collection name

scopevar.name: getDefaultLayout()
scopevar.help: Get's the default layout of the application

scopevar.name: setDefaultLayout(defaultLayout)
scopevar.help: Override the default layout for a request

scopevar.name: getDefaultView()
scopevar.help: Get's the default view of the application

scopevar.name: setDefaultView(defaultView)
scopevar.help: Override the default view for a request

scopevar.name: getViewLayouts()
scopevar.help: Get the registered view layout associations map

scopevar.name: getRegisteredLayouts()
scopevar.help: Get all the registered layouts in the configuration file

scopevar.name: getFolderLayouts()
scopevar.help: Get the registered folder layout associations map

scopevar.name: overrideEvent(event)
scopevar.help: Override the current event in the request collection. This method does not execute the event, it just replaces the event to be executed by the framework's RunEvent() method. This method is usually called from an onRequestStart or onApplicationStart method

scopevar.name: setProxyRequest()
scopevar.help: Set that this is a proxy request

scopevar.name: isProxyRequest()
scopevar.help: Is this a coldbox proxy request

scopevar.name: noRender([remove])
scopevar.help: Set the flag that tells the framework not to render, just execute

scopevar.name: isNoRender()
scopevar.help: Is this a no render request

scopevar.name: getEventName()
scopevar.help: Get the event name

scopevar.name: isNoExecution()
scopevar.help: Determine if we need to execute an incoming event or not

scopevar.name: noExecution()
scopevar.help: Set that the request will not execute an incoming event. Most likely simulating a servlet call

scopevar.name: isSES()
scopevar.help: Is this request in SES mode

scopevar.name: setIsSES(isSES)
scopevar.help: Is this request in SES mode

scopevar.name: getSESBaseURL()
scopevar.help: Get the SES base URL for this request

scopevar.name: setSESBaseURL(sesBaseURL)
scopevar.help: Set the ses base URL for this request

scopevar.name: getSelf()
scopevar.help: Returns index.cfm?{eventName}=

scopevar.name: buildLink(linkTo,[translate],[ssl],[baseURL],[queryString])
scopevar.help: Builds a link to a passed event, either SES or normal link. If the ses interceptor is declared it will create routes

scopevar.name: isEventCacheable()
scopevar.help: Check wether the incoming event has been flagged for caching

scopevar.name: setEventCacheableEntry(cacheEntry)
scopevar.help: Check wether the incoming event has been flagged for caching

scopevar.name: getEventCacheableEntry()
scopevar.help: Get the event cacheable entry

scopevar.name: removeEventCacheableEntry()
scopevar.help: Check wether the incoming event has been flagged for caching

scopevar.name: isViewCacheable()
scopevar.help: Check wether the incoming view has been flagged for caching

scopevar.name: setViewCacheableEntry(cacheEntry)
scopevar.help: Set the view cacheable entry

scopevar.name: getViewCacheableEntry()
scopevar.help: Get the event cacheable entry

scopevar.name: getRoutedStruct()
scopevar.help: Get the routed structure of key-value pairs. What the ses interceptor could match.

scopevar.name: setRoutedStruct(routedStruct)
scopevar.help: Get the routed structure of key-value pairs. What the ses interceptor could match.

scopevar.name: renderData([type],data,[contentType],[encoding],[statusCode],[statusText],[location],[jsonCallback],[jsonQueryFormat],[jsonAsText],[xmlColumnList],[xmlUseCDATA],[xmlListDelimiter],[xmlRootName],[pdfArgs],[formats],[formatsView],[isBinary])
scopevar.help: Use this method to tell the framework to render data for you. The framework will take care of marshalling the data for you

scopevar.name: getRenderData()
scopevar.help: Get the renderData structure

scopevar.name: getHTTPMethod()
scopevar.help: Get the HTTP Request Method Type

scopevar.name: getHTTPContent([json],[xml])
scopevar.help: Get the raw HTTP content

scopevar.name: getHTTPHeader(The header to get,[defaultValue])
scopevar.help: Get an HTTP header

scopevar.name: setHTTPHeader([statusCode],[statusText],[name],[value])
scopevar.help: Set an HTTP Header return RequestContext

scopevar.name: getHTTPBasicCredentials()
scopevar.help: Returns the username and password sent via HTTP basic authentication

scopevar.name: isAjax()
scopevar.help: Determines if in an Ajax call or not by looking at the request headers

scopevar.name: renderWithFormats()
scopevar.help: Render data with formats

scopevar.name: html
scopevar.help: A cool utility that helps you when working with HTML, from creating doc types, to managing your js/css assets, to rendering tables and lists from data

scopevar.name: addJSContent(content,[addToHeader])
scopevar.help: Open and close HTML5 javascript tags so you can easily just add content

scopevar.name: addStyleContent(content,[addToHeader])
scopevar.help: Open and close xhtml style tags so you can easily just add content

scopevar.name: addAsset(asset,[sendToHeader],[async],[defer])
scopevar.help: Add a js/css asset(s) to the html head section. You can also pass in a list of assets via the asset argument to try to load all of them. You can also make this method return the string that will be sent to the header instead.

scopevar.name: br([count])
scopevar.help: Generate line breaks

scopevar.name: nbs([count])
scopevar.help: Generate non-breaking spaces ( )

scopevar.name: heading(title,[size])
scopevar.help: Generate header tags

scopevar.name: tag(tag,[content],[data])
scopevar.help: Surround content with a tag

scopevar.name: anchor(name,[text],[data])
scopevar.help: Create an anchor tag

scopevar.name: href([href],[text],[queryString],[title],[target],[ssl],[noBaseURL],[data])
scopevar.help: Create href tags, using the SES base URL or not

scopevar.name: link(href,[rel],[type],[title],[media],[noBaseURL],[charset],[sendToHeader],[data])
scopevar.help: Create link tags, using the SES base URL or not

scopevar.name: img(src,[alt],[class],[width],[height],[title],[rel],[name],[noBaseURL],[data])
scopevar.help: Create image tags using the SES base URL or not

scopevar.name: ul(values,[column])
scopevar.help: Create un-ordered lists according to passed in values and arguments, compressed HTML

scopevar.name: ol(values,[column])
scopevar.help: Create ordered lists according to passed in values and arguments, compressed HTML

scopevar.name: table(data,[includes],[excludes],[name])
scopevar.help: Convert a table out of data (either a query or array of structures or array of entities)

scopevar.name: meta(name,[content],[type],[sendToHeader])
scopevar.help: Helps you generate meta tags

scopevar.name: docType([type])
scopevar.help: Render a doctype by type name: xhtml11,xhtml1-strict,xhtml-trans,xthml-frame,html5,html4-strict,html4-trans,html4-frame

scopevar.name: slugify(str,[maxLength],[allow])
scopevar.help: Create a URL safe slug from a string

scopevar.name: autoDiscoveryLink([type],[href],[rel],[title],[data])
scopevar.help: Creates auto discovery links for RSS and ATOM feeds.

scopevar.name: video(src,[width],[height],[poster],[autoplay],[controls],[loop],[preload],[noBaseURL],[name],[data])
scopevar.help: Create an HTML 5 video tag

scopevar.name: audio(src,[autoplay],[controls],[loop],[preLoad],[noBaseURL],[name],[data])
scopevar.help: Create an HTML 5 audio tag

scopevar.name: canvas(id,[width],[height],[data])
scopevar.help: Create a canvas tag

scopevar.name: startForm([action],[name],[method],[multipart],[ssl],[noBaseURL],[data])
scopevar.help: Create cool form tags. Any extra argument will be passed as attributes to the form tag

scopevar.name: endForm()
scopevar.help: End a form tag

scopevar.name: startFieldset([legend],[data])
scopevar.help: Create a fieldset tag with or without a legend.

scopevar.name: endFieldset()
scopevar.help: End a fieldset tag

scopevar.name: label(field,[content],[wrapper],[data],[class])
scopevar.help: Render a label tag. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: textArea([name],[cols],[rows],[value],[disabled],[readonly],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[labelClass],[bind],[bindProperty],[data])
scopevar.help: Render out a textarea. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: passwordField([name],[value],[disabled],[readonly],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[labelClass],[bind],[bindProperty])
scopevar.help: Render out a password field. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: urlfield([name],[value],[disabled],[readonly],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[labelClass],[bind],[bindProperty])
scopevar.help: Render out a URL field. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: emailField([name],[value],[disabled],[readonly],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[labelClass],[bind],[bindProperty])
scopevar.help: Render out an email field. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: hiddenField([name],[value],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[labelClass],[bind],[bindProperty])
scopevar.help: Render out a hidden field. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: textField([name],[value],[disabled],[readonly],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[labelClass],[bind],[bindProperty])
scopevar.help: Render out a text field. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: button([name],[value],[disabled],[type],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[data],[labelClass])
scopevar.help: Render out a button. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: fileField([name],[value],[disabled],[readonly],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[labelClass])
scopevar.help: Render out a file field. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: checkBox([name],[value],[disabled],[checked],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[labelClass],[bind],[bindProperty])
scopevar.help: Render out a checkbox. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: radioButton([name],[value],[disabled],[checked],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[labelClass],[bind],[bindProperty])
scopevar.help: Render out a radio button. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: submitButton([name],[value],[disabled],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[labelClass])
scopevar.help: Render out a submit button. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: resetButton([name],[value],[disabled],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[labelClass])
scopevar.help: Render out a reset button. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: imageButton(src,[name],[disabled],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[labelClass])
scopevar.help: Render out a image button. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: options([values],[column],[nameColumn],[selectedIndex],[selectedValue])
scopevar.help: Render out options. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: select([name],[options],[column],[nameColumn],[selectedIndex],[selectedValue],[bind],[bindProperty],[disabled],[multiple],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[data],[labelClass])
scopevar.help: Render out a select tag. Remember that any extra arguments are passed as tag attributes

scopevar.name: inputField([type],[name],[value],[disabled],[checked],[readonly],[wrapper],[groupWrapper],[label],[labelwrapper],[labelClass],[bind],[bindProperty],[data])
scopevar.help: Create an input field using some cool tags and features. Any extra arguments are passed to the tag

scopevar.name: entityFields(entity,[groupWrapper],[fieldwrapper],[labelwrapper],[labelClass],[textareas],[booleanSelect],[showRelations],[manytoone],[manytomany])
scopevar.help: Create fields based on entity properties

scopevar.name: arrayToTable(data,[includes],[excludes],buffer)
scopevar.help: Convert a table out of an array

scopevar.name: queryToTable(data,[includes],[excludes],buffer)
scopevar.help: Convert a table out of an array of structures

scopevar.name: toHTMLList(tag,values,[column],[data])
scopevar.help: Convert a sent in tag type to an HTML list

scopevar.name: bindValue([args])
scopevar.help: Bind entity values

scopevar.name: normalizeID([args])
scopevar.help: Normalize ID with name arguments

scopevar.name: makePretty([text])
scopevar.help: make pretty text

scopevar.name: prepareBaseLink([noBaseURL],[src])
scopevar.help: Prepare a base link

scopevar.name: passIncludeExclude(value,[includes],[excludes])
scopevar.help: checks if a list include exclude check passes

scopevar.name: flattenAttributes(target,[excludes],buffer)
scopevar.help: flatten a struct of attributes to strings

scopevar.name: onMissingMethod(missingMethodName,missingMethodArguments)
scopevar.help: Proxy calls to provided element

scopevar.name: getColumnArray(qry,columnName)
scopevar.help: Returns an array of the values

scopevar.name: $htmlhead(content)
scopevar.help: Facade to cfhtmlhead

scopevar.name: controller
scopevar.help: Copyright Since 2005 ColdBox Framework by Luis Majano and Ortus Solutions, Corp www.ortussolutions.com Manages a ColdBox application, dispatches events and acts as an overall front controller.

scopevar.name: init(appRootPath,[appKey])
scopevar.help: Constructor

scopevar.name: getMemento()
scopevar.help: Get controller memento, used only by decorator only.

scopevar.name: getRenderer()
scopevar.help: Get the system web renderer, you can also retreive it from wirebox via renderer@coldbox

scopevar.name: getDataMarshaller()
scopevar.help: Get the system data marshaller, you can also retreive it from wirebox via dataMarshaller@coldbox

scopevar.name: getCache(cacheName)
scopevar.help: Get a Cache provider from CacheBox

scopevar.name: getLoaderService()
scopevar.help: Get the loader service

scopevar.name: getModuleService()
scopevar.help: Get the module service

scopevar.name: getInterceptorService()
scopevar.help: Get the interceptor service

scopevar.name: getHandlerService()
scopevar.help: Get the handler service

scopevar.name: getRequestService()
scopevar.help: Get the request service

scopevar.name: getSetting(name,[fwSetting],[defaultValue])
scopevar.help: Get a setting from a configuration structure

scopevar.name: settingExists(name,[fwSetting])
scopevar.help: Check if a value exists in a configuration structure

scopevar.name: setSetting(name,value)
scopevar.help: Set a value in the application configuration settings

scopevar.name: getSettingStructure([fwSetting],[deepCopyFlag])
scopevar.help: DEPRECATED: Convenience method to retrieve the config or coldbox settings.

scopevar.name: getPlugin()
scopevar.help: DEPRECATED

scopevar.name: setNextEvent([event],[queryString],[addToken],[persist],[persistStruct],[baseURL],[postProcessExempt],[URL],[URI],[statusCode])
scopevar.help: Set the next event to run and relocate the browser to that event. If you are in SES mode, this method will use routing instead. You can also use this method to relocate to an absolute URL or a relative URI

scopevar.name: runEvent([event],[prePostExempt],[private],[defaultEvent],[eventArguments],[cache],[cacheTimeout],[cacheLastAccessTimeout],[cacheSuffix],[cacheProvider])
scopevar.help: Executes events with full life-cycle methods and returns the event results if any were returned.

scopevar.name: _runEvent([event],[prePostExempt],[private],[defaultEvent],[eventArguments])
scopevar.help: Executes events with full life-cycle methods and returns the event results if any were returned

scopevar.name: locateFilePath(pathToCheck)
scopevar.help: Locate the real path location of a file in a coldbox application. 3 checks: 1) inside of coldbox app, 2) expand the path, 3) Absolute location. If path not found, it returns an empty path

scopevar.name: locateDirectoryPath(pathToCheck)
scopevar.help: Locate the real path location of a directory in a coldbox application. 3 checks: 1) inside of coldbox app, 2) expand the path, 3) Absolute location. If path not found, it returns an empty path

scopevar.name: loadColdBoxSettings()
scopevar.help: Load the internal ColdBox settings

scopevar.name: persistVariables([persist],[persistStruct])
scopevar.help: Internal helper to flash persist elements

scopevar.name: validateAction(action,[inclusion],[exclusion])
scopevar.help: Checks if an action can be executed according to inclusion/exclusion lists

scopevar.name: invoker(target,method,[argCollection],[private])
scopevar.help: Invoke private/public event handler methods

scopevar.name: sendRelocation(URL,[addToken],[statusCode])
scopevar.help: Send a CF relocation

scopevar.name: updateSSL(inURL,ssl)
scopevar.help: Update SSL or not on a request string
